name: Break-In (Pere)
description:
Experimental 2-player variation of Breakout. One player controls the paddle and has to break bricks to reach the top of the screen, and a second player has to place blocks and try to make the paddle lose. You can also play alone against an AI that places bricks (see options menu).

Made in 10 days using Raylib.

Source code: https://github.com/Pere001/break-in

Based on an idea by synchronizer (KTR).
